thread.title: Judge reads Nassar's letter defending himself as 'good doctor'

title: Judge reads Nassar's letter defending himself as 'good doctor'
text:
Judge reads Nassar's letter defending himself as 'good doctor'   02:39 
Ingham County Circuit Court Judge Rosemarie Aquilina read a statement by Larry Nassar, the long-time USA Gymnastics team doctor, defending himself as a 'good doctor'. He was sentenced to up to 175 years in prison for abusing young female gymnasts who were entrusted to his care.   
Ingham County Circuit Court Judge Rosemarie Aquilina read a statement by Larry Nassar, the long-time USA Gymnastics team doctor, defending himself as a 'good doctor'. He was sentenced to up to 175 years in prison for abusing young female gymnasts who were entrusted to his care.  //reut.rs/2naV5Oh
